awards.text: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 5 wins & 21 nominations.

fullplot: A biopic about the actor James Dean, whose stardom of the ultimate teenage rebel as well as the premature death made him a legend. His roles are depicted having much in common with his personal life, most notably the difficult relationship with his father.

title: James Dean
